description: This file defines an asynchronous function to modify an image using an AI agent, including setting up the agent, invoking it with a prompt, and displaying the resulting images.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of processing prompts and returning responses.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Represents an image object used as input or output for the agent.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A model class representing the Google Gemini AI model.

methods.name: modify_image
methods.description: Asynchronously sends a prompt to the agent to modify an image and displays the resulting images.
